title: "Let's Start"
description: A seamless, visual - first collaboration platform where users can easily have contextual collaboration around a DOT (images and documents), Byte(videos) or Threads (threaded conversations). The DOT Wall will connect all notifications providing relevant updates and action items for the users.

## DOT APP üöÄ ‚Äì Visual Collaboration for Teams

Convert documents üìÑ , images üñºÔ∏è, videos üé• into insightful & RUMA (Reusable, Understandable, Modular, Accurate). DOT lets you collaborate dynamically with anyone on any file.üìé


## üîê How to Sign In 

Open DOT and sign in using your workspace link to get started.

## üåü Key Benefits

::div{class="flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-6 mt-6"}
  ::div{class="flex-1 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 border dark:border-gray-700 rounded-lg shadow p-4 text-center dark:text-gray-100"}
    ### üì∏ Capture Screenshots
    Save any screen or pop-up window in an instant to start collaborating.
  ::

  ::div{class="flex-1 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 border dark:border-gray-700 rounded-lg shadow p-4 text-center dark:text-gray-100"}
    ### ‚úèÔ∏è Annotate Visually
    Add text, shapes, and stickers to highlight important ideas on images.
  ::

  ::div{class="flex-1 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 border dark:border-gray-700 rounded-lg shadow p-4 text-center dark:text-gray-100"}
    ### ü§ù Collaborate in Real-Time
    Share your captures and annotations with your team in real time.
  ::
::
